(Program
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "ambient_namespace"
      (Identifier)))
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Class
      (Identifier)))
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "interface_declaration"
      (Identifier)
      (Other "object_type")))
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Class
      (Identifier)
      (Other "ambient_method_declaration"
        (Identifier)
        (Other "call_signature"
          (Params
            (Other "required_parameter"
              (Identifier)
              (Ty
                (Other "predefined_type"))))))
      (FieldDecl
        (Identifier)
        (Ty
          (Other "predefined_type")))
      (Other "ambient_method_declaration"
        (Identifier)
        (Other "call_signature"
          (Params)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))))
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "ambient_function"
      (Identifier)
      (Other "call_signature"
        (Params)
        (Ty
          (Other "type_reference"
            (Identifier)))))))
